document.text:
Subject: RE: Epstein FOIA 
Date: Thu, 01 Jul 2021 15:14:43 +0000 
Sounds good. Thanks, MI 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, July 1, 2021 11:14 AM 
Subject: RE: Epstein FOIA 
Yes, please. That'd be very helpful. Much appreciated, 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, July 1, 202111:08 AM 
Subject: RE: Epstein 
FOIA 
Thanks, Yes, we will make the production tomorrow. We anticipate it will take the Times at least a few days to get 
through it (although we don't know for sure on that front). We can let you know once we've released it tomorrow if that'd 
be helpful. 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, July 1, 202111:06 AM 
Subject: Epstein FOIA 
Morning. Just for your awareness, I got a call regarding the FOIA litigation from one of our press counterparts at Main. 
She asked if it would be okay to refer press inquiries to SDNY, I told her it wasn't a problem. Other than process 
questions, and I anticipate declining to comment anyway. 
EFTA00029452

Do we have a sense of timing as to when this will happen? (I was having a  hard time hearing during the call, but my 
impression was tomorrow and it would be voluminous and take the Times a while to get through?) Thanks. 
Spokesman 
United States Department of Justice 
U.S. Attorney's Office (Southern District of New York 
EFTA00029453
